title: Kristin Cavallari Puts on Cheeky Display in the Tiniest Thong String Bikini
content:
Kristin Cavallari Puts on Cheeky Display in the Tiniest Thong String Bikini originally appeared on Parade.

Kristin Cavallari, 38, is living her best life. The Let’s Be Honest podcast host and former Laguna Beach and The Hillsreality TV star is treating fans to a peek inside her recent Cabo San Lucas vacation.

Related: Minnie Driver, 55, Stuns in Tiny Black Bikini as She Laments 'Being Alone for This Long'

The Uncommon James founder, who was married to former Chicago Bears quarterback Jay Cutler from 2012 to 2022, shared a charming post of herself repeating her iconic "What happens in Cabo stays in Cabo" line from Laguna Beach—a moment that had fans calling her "iconic." But the mom of three’s latest post from Cabo has fans talking—and zooming in.

“Cabo made me do it,” the Southern California native captioned her post, which features a series of three photos of the once-infamous reality TV villain flexing her flawless physique in a teeny tiny black string bikini. Shot from all angles, the 38-year-old stunner looks fit and fabulous as she soaks up the sun and enjoys the stunning pool at her Cabo vacation spot.

Fans are doing a double take at the ageless podcast host’s gorgeous bikini photos, with one commenting, “Kristin, you still look as amazing as you did back in your Laguna Beach days.”

Related: Danielle Jonas, 38, Stuns in String Bikini While Revisiting ‘Place Where Our Story Began’

Others were inspired by the mom of three’s post-baby body, with one asking, “Ok girl, you need to share your workout cuz you look amazing!!!!”

Cavallari is known for her candor and unfiltered approach to her podcast and interviews. While she’s been open about her challenging marriage to Cutler, fans love seeing her thriving—and glowing—on her recent vacation.

Tap here to see Kristin Cavallari's vacation photos.

Kristin Cavallari Puts on Cheeky Display in the Tiniest Thong String Bikini first appeared on Parade on Aug 12, 2025

This story was originally reported by Parade on Aug 12, 2025, where it first appeared.

keywords.name: former Chicago Bears quarterback Jay Cutler

The Uncommon James founder, who was married to former Chicago Bears quarterback Jay Cutler from 2012 to 2022, shared a series of photos of herself flexing her flawless physique in a tiny black string bikini. The photos have been viewed as iconic by fans, with some expressing admiration for her post and her post expressing her post-baby body.
shortSummary: Kristin Cavallari puts on a stunning bikini display in a tiny black string bikini on her Cabo San Lucas vacation, captivating fans with her stunning physique.
argos_summary: Kristin Cavallari, 38, recently shared photos from her vacation in Cabo San Lucas, showcasing her fit physique in a tiny black string bikini. The former reality TV star and podcast host received praise from fans for her appearance, with many commenting on her ageless beauty and post-baby body. Cavallari, known for her candidness, continues to thrive after her marriage to Jay Cutler, and her vacation posts have sparked admiration and inspiration among her followers.
